Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.TextEditors.Displays.Internals.HeaderDriver Class Reference Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.TextEditors.Displays.Internals.HeaderDriver
The header has @onclick events in the UI and as such could not be made into a RenderFragment. Instead, the UI was inlined into the TextEditorViewModelDisplay.

Detailed Description
The header has @onclick events in the UI and as such could not be made into a RenderFragment. Instead, the UI was inlined into the TextEditorViewModelDisplay.
TODO: Move this back into TextEditorDefaultHeaderDisplay. This was made into the Driver idea, then made back into a component.
